input_text.Prompt:
Using the product specifications and product title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product title:
A Chaya Plant in a Six Inch Pot

Product specifications:
A single new Emeritus Gardens Chaya rooted cutting shipped in a Six inch pot.
Emeritus Gardens Plant Food is included so that Chaya roots develop quickly and plants can be planted out quickly.
Ideal vegetable .for highly nutritious soups and stews. Emeritus Gardens Care sheet is included.
Vitamin and iron content exceeds that of Spinach plants.
Grow in warm sunny southern gardens or indoors in the North.
Shippped BARE ROOTED to California.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Play basketball anytime, anywhere with this portable basketball hoop. It features a 44 inch steel framed acrylic backboard, a Slam jam breakaway rim, and a white all-weather net. The three-piece 3 inch round pole and 35-gallon capacity base filled with water or sand provide stability and durability. The ratchet lift allows for easy height adjustment from 8 feet to 10 feet in 4-inch increments. This portable basketball hoop is perfect for backyard, driveway, or park play.
input_text.Response B: Get your Chaya plant now! Grow your own nutritious vegetables with this easy-to-care-for plant. Vitamin and iron content exceeds that of Spinach plants, making it a great source of essential nutrients. Ideal for soups and stews, this plant will provide your family with healthy and delicious meals. Get your Chaya plant today and start growing your own nutritious vegetables!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.feedback: Response A is off topic and Response B is low effort, low quality
